Description.0: Built apon an up-scaled Endevour class spaceframe.
Description.1: The design history of the venture was an interesting one.
Description.2: Initialy planned as a refit of the Endevour, these ships used design enchancments that came from the Enterprise class's development.
Description.3: These ships became stand-a-lone class when a refit was deemed impractical as it would require extensive modification to the spaceframe.
